channel.title: PJO FM - 3/13 - Demigods (Town) Wins!
channel.description:
Percy Jackson FM - Hosted by @Aelin and @Mistyx and reviewed by @DatBird
![image|396x500](upload://9xtgACFQXkIr8QBB0rICQMFvF3g.jpeg) Game Info - - Game Size: 13 - Game Speed: Days: 48/24 - Game Type: Special - Rolemadness - This game has bastard mechanics. However, the OP and your rolecard will not lie to you. - There may or may not be anti-claim mechanics in place. - There is a D1 Start and a D1 Execute. Executions are both Plurality and Majority. - Days are 48 hours and Nights are 24 hours. Actions will lock one hour before EoN. Night may be skipped if all living players with applicable abilities vote to skip the night. - MyLo/LyLo will be announced. - The Titans have a 24/7 scumchat, and the nightkill is mandatory and assignable. - This is a closed game. However, you are aware of the fact that there are ten town members and three scum members. - Scum do get fakeclaims.
Game Rules - - Follow the General Forum Rules, linked here - https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244, as well as the Forum Mafia Rules, linked here - https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926 - Alts are not allowed in this game. - Actions are done by messaging in your rolecard. Questions may be asked in your rolecard. - Last wills/logs are not present in the game. - Votes must be done in the format of **/vote [PLAYER NAME]** @Aelin and any applicable cohosts or vc-bots, and unvotes must be done in the format of **/unvote** @Aelin. If this is not followed, your vote will not be considered valid. This is to make it easier on me, thank you for understanding. - No-elimination is not a valid vote. - Players should post at least 20 on-topic posts per day. If a player fails to meet this, they will first be prodded, and then either force-replaced or modkilled. - Excessive AtE is heavily frowned upon.
Limited Rolelist:
[color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] [color=red]**Titan**[/color] [color=red]**Titan**[/color] [color=red]**Titan**[/color]
[details="Example Rolecards (These flavors are not in the game)"] >**[color=gree]Travis Stoll[/color]** >*Son of Hermes* > >![image|200x200](upload://1wOpke6OS04FWzDfLIWI6YUokya.jpeg) > >*[color=gree]**Demigod**[/color] - Offensive* > >**Night: Up To No Good** - Pick a player and... *watch over them* for the night. See who visits them and who they visit. (2 Uses) > >[color=gree]***Defeat the Titans.***[/color]
>**[color=red]Oceanus[/color]** > >![image|201x251](upload://nC7IVy9E6wJlI7b4jEjuKkyCBUS.jpeg) > >*[color=red]**Titan**[/color] - Support* > >**Day: Mist** - Cover all titans in a thin layer of mist, causing all alignment checks on them tonight to return as 'Demigod' for the night. (2 Uses) > >**Night: Fraternizing** - Choose a player and add them to a neighborhood. (2 Uses) > >**Night: High Tide** - Prevent all visits to you tonight. Abilities used on you will still take up a Use. (3 Uses) > >[color=red]***Reach parity with the Demigods.***[/color] [/details]
Win Conditions:
Demigods: [color=gree]***Defeat the Titans.***[/color] Titans: [color=red]***Reach parity with the Demigods.***[/color]
Players:
1. ~~EliThePsycho~~ - **Executed D2** - **[color=gree]Katie Gardner[/color]** 2. ~~clonedcheese~~ - **Died N1** - [color=gree]**Annabeth Chase**[/color] 3. ~~Emilia~~ -> WindwardAway 4. ~~Wazza~~ - **Died N2** - [color=gree]**Percy Jackson**[/color] 5. ~~Silviu~~ - **Died N4** - [color=gree]**Jason Grace**[/color] 6. ~~Zone~~ - **Died N2** - [color=red]**Kronos**[/color] 7. ~~Luxy~~ - **Executed D3** - [color=gree]**Reyna Ramirez-Arellano**[/color] 8. ~~thepigeonnyc~~ - **Executed D1** - [color=gree]**Hazel Levesque**[/color] 9. ~~Nightingale~~ - **Executed D4** - [color=red]**Koios**[/color] 10. Jane 11. ~~min~~ - **Died Night 3** - [color=gree]**Will Solace**[/color] 12. gorta 13. Marluxion
Backups:
1. WindwardAway 2. Wazza
Spectators:
1. Marshal (Uninformed) 2. Chloe (Uninformed) 4. sulit (Uninformed) 5. astand (Informed) 7. katze (Uninformed) 9. Intensify (Informed) 10. DatBird (Informed) 11. KyoDaz (Uninformed) 12. Arete (Informed) 13. Whysper (Uninformed) 14. Arctic (Uninformed) 15. A very cute girl (Informed)
Threadlinks: https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/pjo-fm-day-2-11-13/88703/1582 - EoD1/EoN1 https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/pjo-fm-night-2-10-13/88703/2661 - EoD2 https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/pjo-fm-day-3-8-13/88703/3104 - EoD3 https://forum.throneoflies.com/t/pjo-fm-night-4-5-13/88703/3305 - EoD4
